nodes.text: A medical scanner was a type of scanner used to do medical diagnostics on various lifeforms, and was generally included aboard starships and in various hospitals.
Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano utilized a medical scanner aboard the Twilight to check the huttlet Rotta, Jabba Desilijic Tiure's son's medical status upon rescuing him from the Separatists.
